name: Speedroid Wing Synchron
text: If this card is added to the Extra Deck face-up and there are 2 or more different Monster Types among the WIND Synchro Monsters you control: You can send 1 "Speedroid" Spell/Trap from your Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Speedroid Wing Synchron" once per turn.
pendulum_text: Once per turn: You can destroy both this card and 1 Level 2 WIND Pendulum Monster Card in your Pendulum Zone, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Clear Wing Synchro Dragon" from your Extra Deck (this is treated as a Synchro Summon), also, for the rest of this turn, cards in your Pendulum Zone cannot be destroyed by card effects, also you cannot Special Summon, except WIND monsters.
